title: Alex.Jones.Show.2008.07.03-chakra71
description:
Thursday July 3, 2008

Alex talks with former commanding general of the United States Army Intelligence and Security Command, Albert Stubblebine, and his wife Rima E. Laibow, MD, about Codex Alimentarius. Alex also welcomes Dr. Ron Paul. Special guest today is David Icke, who recently announced he will run in Britain's parliamentary by-election. 

Sourced from the 32 Kbps live stream using Total Recorder 7 Pro, or from the 42 Kbps podcast.  Re-encoded to 32 Kbps @ 22.05 KHz.  Editing done using Nero WaveEditor 4 by hand. Four hours duration before commercial edit takes it down to about 3 hours of playing time.  

Note, there was a break in the show during the first hour (no guest at the time) for about 4 minutes.  I edited out the music/dead air.  The NWO strikes again!
